title: Making of the soil
creator_credit: Crown Film Unit and J.V. Durden
brief_description: This instructional film for farmers and agricultural students, tells of the formation and fertility of the soil, the variety of soils in Britain, and stresses the need for their preservation. By a knowledge of the origin of soil and understanding of its needs, we can preserve and improve its fertility.
